resources.string: (of the sun) shine upon; bask; dry in the sun

"Today isApril 6th, the holidays are over and school starts. Last year, I was in the first grade of elementary school. This year, I am in the second grade, and my brother is also going to school. In the new semester, we have released a lot of new books, and my brother and I are very happy. "
"What day is the day after tomorrow? "
The day before yesterday is Monday.
There is Chinese class on Wednesday.
There is art class on Friday.

"On Sunday morning, mother asked Xiaoming, \"Do you have PE class tomorrow?\" Xiaoming said, \"Tomorrow is Monday. Our class has Chinese and art classes, but no PE class. On Tuesday the day after tomorrow, there is PE class.\" "
"What time do you take a shower? "
"I take a shower at ten in the morning. "
"I go to bed at eight forty at night. "

"I get up at 7:10 in the morning and have breakfast at 7:30. At ten minutes to eight, my brother and I go to school together. We start class at 8:30 and have lunch at 12 noon. At three o'clock in the afternoon, I return home with my brother. "
The weather is very nice today.
"The dress is neither too small nor too small, it fits perfectly. "
"Today's weather is neither cold nor hot, very comfortable. "

"There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, autumn and winter. Spring is warm, summer is hot, autumn is cool, and winter is cold. It's spring now and the weather is nice, neither too cold nor too hot. "
"Xiaoling: Xiaohua, what month is your birthday? "
"Xiaoling: Today is May 5th, and tomorrow is your birthday! "
"Xiaohua: Yes! Sister, go to the playground with me tomorrow, okay? "

"Beijing is the capital of China, it is a beautiful city. There are four seasons there: March, April, May are spring; June, July, August are summer; September, October, November are autumn; December, January, February are winter. Spring in Beijing is often windy. Summer is very hot. Autumn is cool, neither cold nor hot. Winter is cold and sometimes snows. "
"My mother taught my sister Chinese songs. "
"The PE teacher taught us Chinese Kung Fu. "
"Uncle often surfs the Internet and often watches TV. "
"There are some clothes and some daily necessities in the box. "
Teacher Chen teaches us Chinese class

"This semester, Mr. Chen teaches us Chinese, and Mr. Li teaches us physical education. This Monday, our class had Chinese class in the morning. Teacher Chen taught us new words, and also taught us sentences and texts. In the afternoon we had music class, and Teacher Li taught us Chinese songs. Everyone wars very happy. "
"We give the teacher a bouquet of flowers. "
"He asks me what day of the week it is. "

"There is a Chinese class today, and the teacher teaches the students three Chinese characters. In the evening, Xiao Ming wrote a letter to his mother. He said to his mother: \"Mom, this is my gift to you!\" There are three Chinese characters on the letter: I love you! "
"Grandpa taught Xiaohua to write Chinese characters. "
"My aunt asked us to watch acrobatics. "
"The teacher asked me to answer questions. "
Grandma Invites Us To Eat Chinese Food

"Today's Mid-Autumn Festival, we celebrate with grandma. Grandma was very happy, she invited us to eat Chinese food. Mom and dad gave grandma a box of tea, and my younger siblings and I gave grandma a scarf. Let's wish her a happy Mid-Autumn Festival together! "
"Grandma likes to listen to Peking Opera. "
"My sister loves to draw, but not to write. "
"Grandpa likes to drink tea, not Coke. "

"Xiaohong likes to watch movies, she especially likes to watch Chinese movies, and Xiaohua also likes to watch them. Today the cinema is playing Chinese movies, heard it is very interesting. Xiaohong is very happy, she plans to invite Xiaohua to go to the movies together. "
Little Goat: Today is my birthday and I invite my friends to dinner.
Kitten: Little goat, little goat, here I come! I\'ll give you a basket of greens.
Little Goat: Ah, greens! I love green vegetables, thank you!
Little Rabbit: Little goat, little goat, here I come! I\'ll give you a carrot!
Little Goat: Ah, carrots! I love carrots, thank you!
Kitten, Little Rabbit: Happy birthday to you!

"Kitten, little rabbit and little goat are good friends. Today is the little goat's birthday, and he invites his friends to dinner. The kitten loves fish, and the little goat prepared a fish for him. The little rabbit loves carrots, and the little goat prepared a carrot for him. The kitten and the little rabbit gave the little goat a basket of vegetables, and together they said to the little goat: \"Happy birthday to you!\" "
We play with sand by the sea.
My brother is studying Chinese in China.
Where does your sister go to school?
Dad doesn\'t work in the company.
I\'m not home for dinner today.
We Play With Sand By The Sea

"Yesterday was Sunday, and my parents were not at work. We go to the beach together as a family. The seaside scenery is so gorgeous! The sky is very blue, the sea is also very blue, and many people swim in the sea. My father and my mother played volleyball at the beach, my brother and I were playing sand at the beach, and my sister was sunbathing at the beach. This day is so great! "
I go to the store with my mother.
My sister and my sister go to the botanical garden.
Xiaohua and Xiaohong play chess together.
Brother and brother play table tennis together.
Xiao HuaMao Brings Fish To Grandmother

" The mother cat asked Xiao Hua Mao to go to her grandmother's house and gave her two fishes. The little cat said: \"Mom, I don't dare to go by myself, you can go with me.\" The mother said: \"You are a brave child, you have grown up, go by yourself. Mom does the laundry at home.\" The little cat said : \"Okay Mom, bye!\" "
I go to the zoo to see pandas.
Mom goes to the store to buy something.
Xiao Hong come to my house to watch TV.
Dad comes to pick me up at school.
He arrives at the post office to pick up the package.
She arrives at the office to find teacher Wang.
I return to the classroom to get the keys.
I return home to change clothes.
Grandpa Goes To The Park To Play Tai Chi

Grandpa and Dad both like to exercise. Grandpa loves to play Tai Chi, and he often goes to the park to play Tai Chi in the morning. Dad likes to run, and I often go to the beach with him on weekends. Our bodies are all healthy.
Mom takes the train to Grandma\'s house.
Older brother takes the airplane to Hong Kong.
Uncle uses cell phone to surf the internet.
I help the teacher clean the blackboard.
Older sister helps mother wash the dishes.
We Go To School By Car

"Today, we go to the zoo by car. There are many kinds of animals in the zoo. The big monkey teaches the little monkey to climb the mountain, the tiger mother washes the little tiger's face, the elephant sucks water with its long trunk, and the giant panda eats bamboo in the grass. The classmates liked them very much, and everyone said: \"Animals are our good friends.\" "

"On Sunday, the weather was very sunny, and the school organized us to go on an outing. In the morning, we drove to the suburbs. The scenery there is particularly beautiful, with mountains and water. In the morning, we climbed mountains and flew kites. In the afternoon, we sang, danced and played hide-and-seek at the foot of the mountain. Everyone is very happy! "
